testcases.name: listdevices
testcases.description: Get list of available devices in the controller

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of remained battery of AeonLabsGen6MultiSensor ( unit % )

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of TIME ( Multi sensor will send basic set to associated device if no motion occurs in that interval )for verifying value which is available

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of ENABLE_MOTION ( enable/disable the function of motion sensor) for verifying value which is available

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of REPORT_SENSOR ( Reports (humidity, luminance, battery, temperature) will be sent in timing inverals to our controller) for verifying value which is available

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of TIME_AUTO_REPORT ( The interval to send REPORT_SENSOR to timming group 1 )for verifying value which is available

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of ONOFF_GROUP for verifying which device is available in group on/off

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of TEMP ( temperature in fahrenheit and celsius ) for verifying value which is available

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of HUMI ( humidity percentage and absolute humidity ) for verifying value which is available

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of LUMI ( luminance index ) for verifying value which is available

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Set ASSOCIATION ONOFF_GROUP, this case is Led zwave device, those notification will be sent to Led zwave devive whenever having motion occurs

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of ONOFF_GROUP which we have set before

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Set ASSOCIATION ONOFF_GROUP, this case is our controller , those notification will be sent to controller whenever having motion occurs

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of ONOFF_GROUP which we have set before

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Set value 3BC4 for TIME (PIR time), value 3BC4 means sensor will send BASIC SET to associated devices if no motion is triggered again in 15300s

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of TIME for verifying value which we have set before

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Set value 3BC5 ( 15301s ) for TIME (PIR time), this testcases expect to faile because the value is greater than maximum TIME value

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of TIME for verifying value which we have set before

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Set value 0003 for TIME (PIR time), value 0003 means sensor will send BASIC SET to associated devices if no motion is triggered again in 3s

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of TIME for verifying value which we have set before

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Set value 0 for ENABLE_MOTION, value 0 means disable function of motion sensor

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of ENABLE_MOTION for verifying value which we have set before

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Set value 1 for ENABLE_MOTION, value 1 means enable function of motion sensor

testcases.name: readspec_takeaction
testcases.description: Wait for 60s to test motion sensor, it means while 60s if there have a motion occurs then associated Led zwave device will turn on

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Set value 28DE80 for TIME_AUTO_REPORT, value 28DE80 means report sensor messages will be sent to our controller after 2678400s

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of TIME_AUTO_REPORT for verifying value which we have set before

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Set value 08DE80 for TIME_AUTO_REPORT, value 08DE80 means report sensor messages will be sent to our controller after 581248s

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of TIME_AUTO_REPORT for verifying value which we have set before

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Set value 0 for REPORT_SENSOR, value 0 means disable all reports will be sent to controller

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of REPORT_SENSOR for verifying value which we have set before

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Set value E1 for REPORT_SENSOR, value E1 means enable all reports will be sent to controller include temperature, humidity ,luminance, battery

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of REPORT_SENSOR for verifying value which we have set before

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Set value 05 for TIME_AUTO_REPORT, value 05 means report sensor messages will be sent to controller after 5s

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of TIME_AUTO_REPORT for verifying value which we have set before

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Remove associated Z-wave Led device from ONOFF_GROUP.

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Verify value of removed action

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Remove controller from ONOFF_GROUP.

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Verify value of removed action
